text: Aagaardia longicalcis is a species of fly discovered by Ole Anton Sæther in 2000.Bisby F.A., Roskov Y.R., Orrell T.M., Nicolson D., Paglinawan L.E., Bailly N., Kirk P.M., Bourgoin T., Baillargeon G., Ouvrard D. (red.) (7 September 2011). ”Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: 2011 Annual Checklist.”. Species 2000: Reading, No sub-species specified in Catalogue of Life.Systema Dipterorum. Pape T. & Thompson F.C. (eds), ==References== Category:Chironomidae Category:Insects described in 2000
title: Aagaardia longicalcis
